/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades adorned with vibrant signs and advertisements that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the man-made structures below. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting different parts of the city. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
